other_tests.findings: Type 2 fiber atrophy; sudomotor innervation appeared poor and well-organized in all samples; no vasointestinal peptide nerves observed; abundant dopamine/hydroxylase immunoreactive fibers in skin samples from shoulder.
Suggested generalized anhidrosis; paradoxical hyperhidrosis in the upper trunk, neck, shoulders, and armpits in a cooled room.

Showed minimal difference between mean diurnal and nocturnal values with blunted physiological nocturnal fall; significant 24-hour body core temperature fluctuation with normal midline estimating statistic of rhythm, reduced amplitude, and slightly advanced acrophase.
